thread.title: Ravi Teja to play a lecturer
thread.title_full: Ravi Teja to play a lecturer

author: Deccan
title: Ravi Teja to play a lecturer
text: Deccan Chronicle | Suresh Kavirayani | October 23, 2015, 23.48 pm Ravi Teja Ravi Teja will be playing a lecturer in his next film Yevado Okadu. The Venu Sriram film was launched on Thursday on the occasion of Dasara. Dil Raju, who had made Bhadra with Ravi Teja 10 years ago is producing the film. “Ravi Teja is playing a lecturer and Anupama Parameswaran of Premam will be a student,” says a source. The film’s shooting will start from Monday. “There is another female lead and we will announce her later,” says Dil Raju, adding that he was planning to release the film next summer. Meanwhile Ravi Teja’s Bengal Tiger is also set to release soon.
